snippet.title: Johnny Depp's Lawyer's Epic Closing Statement
snippet.description:
Here is the Epic Closing Statement From Johnny Depp's Lawyer

SUBSCRIBE FOR MORE : http://bit.ly/32rc7vI
___________________________________________

Now we all know; Heard and Depp began dating around the end of 2011 or the start of 2012. It was also in 2012 that Depp and long-time partner Paradis publicly announced their separation after 14 years of dating. Depp and Heard married in a very private ceremony in their home in LA, in 2015. On May 23, 2016, Heard filed for divorce from Depp and also obtained a temporary restraining order against the him. She alleged that Depp had physically abused her during their relationship, and said it was usually while under the influence of drugs or alcohol. However, a police spokesman told People that an investigation into the domestic incident radio call found that no crime had taken place. Depp denied these accusations and through his representatives said Heard was "attempting to secure a premature financial resolution by alleging abuse." And you know the rest.



Music In This Video : 

Track: Odessa — LiQWYD & Scandinavianz
Music provided by Audio Library Plus
Watch: https://youtu.be/jNy-Dp3lgcg
